name: 特质享乐能力量表调查
description: 一项特质享乐能力的测量，评估人们在享乐目标追求中的成功程度及干扰性思维的出现。
instructions: 参与者根据每项陈述对自己的适合程度进行评分
reference: Bernecker, K., & Becker, D. (2020). Beyond Self-Control: Mechanisms of Hedonic Goal Pursuit and Its Relevance for Well-Being. Personality and Social Psychology Bulletin. https://doi.org/10.1177/0146167220941998
